question: The Supreme Court has suspended the one-man committee under which personality, which was formed to oversee steps to tackle stubble burning?
explanation:
The Supreme Court has recently suspended the one-man committee of retired Supreme Court judge Justice Madan B Lokur to oversee steps to tackle stubble burning.
The Central Government said to the apex court that it would create a permanent body through legislation to deal with air pollution and the stubble burning problem in Delhi and NCR states.
